select id from chat_msg where is_latest = 1
and room_id = #{roomId}
and ((room_id = #{roomId} and user_id = #{userId}) or (room_id = #{userId} and user_id = #{roomId}))
order by gmt_create desc limit 1,1

select cm.id, cm.user_id, cm.room_id, cm.content, cm.type, cm.is_latest, cm.send_time, u.user_name as userName, u.avatar as userAvatar from chat_msg cm inner join user u on u.id = cm.user_id where cm.is_latest = 1 and (cm.room_id = #{roomId} or cm.user_id = #{roomId}) order by cm.send_time
